1599080.name: Slow and Steady
1599080.description:
世界上最慢的游戏！

我们的游戏是免费的。你准备耐心了吗?

这件游戏基础了兔子对乌龟的童话故事

每次点击时，乌龟移动0.1厘米。

您别忘了保存！

许多可爱的动物会为你加油的！



The Slowest game in the world!

It's Free, but are you patient?

Slow and Steady is a single-play casual Game.
Press the arrow key to move forward and reach your destination.

○ Turtle VS Rabbit
○ Based on fairy tale
○ One time click > turtle go forward 1cm (0.4 inch)
○ Make sure you save it.
○ Various cute animal friends cheer for you!
○ I live my life a quarter inch at a time.
1599080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
